main_definition: A video is a recorded visual medium that captures moving images, often accompanied by sound, used to convey information or entertainment.

meanings_and_examples.example: I just watched an amazing wildlife documentary on video.
We have a collection of family home videos from our childhood.
I'm going to the cinema to watch the latest action video today.
My old videocassette recorder uses VHS tapes for recording videos.
I love playing video games on my console in the evening.
YouTube is a popular platform for sharing and watching online videos.
